text: @realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC Your gov cares more about the health of his people than the over inflated ego of a 5x draft dodging NYC punk-ass coward who is willing to continue spreading Covid19 throughout the US.  So, don't lose a great gov over a bootlicker like we have in TX.  On Nov 3rd vote tRump out !
